itl.enabler.api

Interface Forecourt.ForecourtEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Forecourt.ForecourtEventAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    Forecourt

    public static interface Forecourt.ForecourtEventListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Event listener for the Forecourt class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConfigChangeEvent(ConfigChangeEventArgs evArgs)
      This event occurs when one of the Forecourt object configuration has changed.
      void onConnectAsyncResultEvent(ConnectCompletedEventArgs evArgs)
      Occurs when the asynchronous connect completes
      void onMessageReceivedEvent(MessageReceivedEventArgs evArgs)
      This event is raised when a message is received from another terminal
      void onServerEvent(java.util.EventObject eventObject)
      This event is raised when a server apiConnection error occurs and apiConnection is lost
      void onServerJournalEvent(ServerJournalEventArgs evArgs)
      This event is raised when an error is recorded on the server
      void onServerPowerEvent(java.util.EventObject eventObject)
      This event is raised when a server power event is recorded
      void onStatusChangeEvent(ForecourtStatusEventArgs evArgs)
      This event is raised when a status changes.
      Currently only Pump Light and CurrrentMode status changes are supported.
      void onTagReadEvent(TagReadEventArgs evArgs)
      This event is fired when a Tag read is detected on the system.

    • Method Detail

      • onConfigChangeEvent

        void onConfigChangeEvent(ConfigChangeEventArgs evArgs)
        This event occurs when one of the Forecourt object configuration has changed. This change could be an addition, update or a delete.

      • onConnectAsyncResultEvent

        void onConnectAsyncResultEvent(ConnectCompletedEventArgs evArgs)
        Occurs when the asynchronous connect completes

        Note : This event occurs when the asynchronous connect has completed. Check the value of ConnectCompletedEventArgs.getConnectResult() for the connect result.

      • onMessageReceivedEvent

        void onMessageReceivedEvent(MessageReceivedEventArgs evArgs)
        This event is raised when a message is received from another terminal

      • onServerEvent

        void onServerEvent(java.util.EventObject eventObject)
        This event is raised when a server apiConnection error occurs and apiConnection is lost

      • onServerJournalEvent

        void onServerJournalEvent(ServerJournalEventArgs evArgs)
        This event is raised when an error is recorded on the server

      • onServerPowerEvent

        void onServerPowerEvent(java.util.EventObject eventObject)
        This event is raised when a server power event is recorded

      • onStatusChangeEvent

        void onStatusChangeEvent(ForecourtStatusEventArgs evArgs)
        This event is raised when a status changes.
        Currently only Pump Light and CurrrentMode status changes are supported.

      • onTagReadEvent

        void onTagReadEvent(TagReadEventArgs evArgs)
        This event is fired when a Tag read is detected on the system.

        Note :
        Indicates the Pump and/or Tag Reader where the tag was presented.
        For readers integrated into the pump the TagReaderID will have the value -1.
        For readers that are not mapped to a specific pump, the PumpNumber will have the value -1.
